main.name: Reinaldo Taslim
main.caption: I'm a mobile developer graduate and I'm passionate in programming both front end and backend.
main.post_introduction: Yeah, I love sitting down and typing things to develop some stuffs like websites, apps, softwares, browsing some new stuffs and...
main.introduction: Oh hi! I'm Reinaldo Taslim. Reinaldo or Rei for short. I'm an Indonesian programmer who loves and is passion for programming on both frontend and backend. I graduated from Asia Pacific University with a Mobile Technology degree in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. My goal is to pursue my skills further from what I have learned and learn some new stuffs such as Game Development and Game Art Design.

description: Compiled SASS and JS files using Webpack and Babel.
Developed, tested, and deployed responsive web apps written in HTML/CSS.
Developed and tested responsive email template using Cerberus written in HTML/CSS.
Adapt to Linux environment and work with the team on Scrum methodology.
Automate an email worker service with Cronjob and RabbitMQ in Python on MVC architecture.
Developed automation documentation and reporting to PDF in JAVA.

projects.title: SocialPal
projects.description: SocialPal is a Social Media Management Application that serves the purpose of managing multiple social medias under one platform. The current social medias that are integrated into this application are LinkedIn and Twitter.

projects.title: Space Food
projects.description: A Food Ordering Website made in ASP.NET with an admin page that has CRUD functionalities towards products and users.

projects.title: TravelPal
projects.description: Book a place to stay with TravelPal or become a host to earn cash from hosting a place to rent.

projects.title: Redeem Voucher
projects.description: A simple REST API that can redeem voucher codes and view the discount percentage.

projects.title: Music IOS
projects.description: Music  player made in Swift Programming Language.

projects.title: Retail Shop
projects.description: A simple retail shop system that has both customer and admin view with CRUD functionalities with JSON as the dummy database for users and items.
